1339930.name: Fantasy Grounds - Conan: Fields of Glory & Thrilling Encounters Geomorphic Tile Set
1339930.description:
Conan: Fields of Glory & Thrilling Encounters Geomorphic Tile Set

Expand your Conan Adventures in an Age Undreamed Of roleplaying campaigns with this geomorphic tile set which provides the perfect tabletop furniture for your miniatures.
This 16 tile set card set (8 x large and 8 x half size) is marked with movement spaces to match the Conan boardgame by Monolith and features scenes from Fields of Glory & Thrilling Encounters, bringing Conan's grim Hyborian Age to barbarous life, by Crom!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
Nerd Eye Industries, LLC
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Conan 2d20 ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
